channel.title: Mirskys Worst of the Web on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Mirskys Worst of the Web on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Meet The Internet's First Hater
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Two decades ago this month, a guy named Mirsky changed the internet forever in his own subtle way. His product? A site called Mirsky’s Worst of the Web. It was one of the internet’s first true phenomena and an icon of Web 1.0 culture. For a couple of years, he could count press mentions from sources as prominent as The Washington Post, People, and The Los Angeles Times.
